Uses of Interface
org.jruyi.io.ILongCodec

  • Packages that use ILongCodec 
    Package Description
    org.jruyi.io
    JRuyi IO Package Version 1.1

    • Uses of ILongCodec in org.jruyi.io

      Methods in org.jruyi.io that return ILongCodec 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ILongCodec LongCodec.bigEndian()
      Returns a big-endian long codec.
      ILongCodec LongCodec.ILongCodecProvider.bigEndianLongCodec()
      Returns a big-endian long codec.
      static ILongCodec LongCodec.littleEndian()
      Returns a little-endian long codec.
      ILongCodec LongCodec.ILongCodecProvider.littleEndianLongCodec()
      Returns a little-endian long codec.
      Methods in org.jruyi.io with parameters of type ILongCodec 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long IBuffer.get(int index, ILongCodec codec)
      Uses the specified codec to decode the bytes starting at the specified index from the underlying buffer into a long value and returns the resultant long value.
      IBuffer IBuffer.prepend(long l, ILongCodec codec)
      Writes the bytes, encoded from the specified long value l with the specified codec, to the head of this buffer.
      long IBuffer.read(ILongCodec codec)
      Uses the specified codec to decode the bytes starting at position from the underlying buffer into a long value and returns the resultant long value.
      IBuffer IBuffer.set(int index, long l, ILongCodec codec)
      Sets the bytes starting at the specified index to the ones encoded from the specified long value l with the specified codec.
      IBuffer IBuffer.write(long l, ILongCodec codec)
      Writes the bytes, decoded from the specified long value l with the specified codec, to the end of this buffer.
